snippet: Soft export orders at the Canton Fair are seen as a relatively significant sign of trouble for the overall Chinese economy.
abstract: Soft export orders at the Canton Fair, China's biggest marketplace for exporters and buyers, are seen as a relatively significant sign of trouble for the overall Chinese economy.
lead_paragraph: Soft export orders at the Canton Fair are seen as a relatively significant sign of trouble for the overall Chinese economy.

headline.seo: Chinese Exporters Show Weakness at Canton Fair
headline.main: Chinese Exporters’ Weakness at Fair Points to Broader Economic Anxiety
headline.print_headline: Chinese Exporters’ Weakness at Fair Points to Broader Economic Anxiety
